ch.epfl.sdp.peakar.database

Interface DatabaseSnapshot

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FirebaseDatabaseSnapshot

    public interface DatabaseSnapshot
    This interface represents a Database Snapshot, i.e. a copy of a database child retrieved and available locally.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DatabaseSnapshot child(java.lang.String path)
      Get a snapshot of the given child.
      boolean exists()
      Check if the current DB snapshot exists.
      java.lang.Iterable<DatabaseSnapshot> getChildren()
      Give access to all of the immediate children of this snapshot.
      java.lang.String getKey()
      Get the key of the current DB snapshot.
      java.lang.Object getValue()
      Get the value of the current DB snapshot.
      <T> T getValue(java.lang.Class<T> valueType)
      Get the value of the current DB snapshot.

    • Method Detail

      • child

        DatabaseSnapshot child(java.lang.String path)
        Get a snapshot of the given child.
        Parameters:
        path - path of the new child from the current snapshot.

      • getKey

        java.lang.String getKey()
        Get the key of the current DB snapshot.

      • getValue

        <T> T getValue(@NonNull
               java.lang.Class<T> valueType)
        Get the value of the current DB snapshot.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the retrieved value.
        Parameters:
        valueType - type of the retrieved value.

      • getValue

        java.lang.Object getValue()
        Get the value of the current DB snapshot.
        Returns:
        value as an object.

      • exists

        boolean exists()
        Check if the current DB snapshot exists.
        Returns:
        true if the snapshot is not empty, false otherwise.

      • getChildren

        java.lang.Iterable<DatabaseSnapshot> getChildren()
        Give access to all of the immediate children of this snapshot.
